custom_nodes.author: #NOTICE_1.13
custom_nodes.title: NOTICE: This channel is not the default channel.
custom_nodes.description:
If you see this message, your ComfyUI-Manager is outdated.
Recent channel provides only the list of the latest nodes. If you want to find the complete node list, please go to the Default channel.
Making LoRA has never been easier!

custom_nodes.author: Yuan-ManX
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Bagel
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-Bagel is now available in ComfyUI, BAGEL is an open‑source multimodal foundation model with 7B active parameters (14B total) trained on large‑scale interleaved multimodal data.

custom_nodes.author: TensorKaze
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TkNodes
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for ComfyUI with advanced image scaling, latent manipulation, and Flux sampling

custom_nodes.author: pureexe
custom_nodes.title: DiffusionLight-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: DiffusionLight (Turbo) implemented in ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: MrSamSeen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_SSBeforeAfterNode
custom_nodes.description: Two powerful custom nodes for ComfyUI to create stunning before-and-after transition videos. These nodes are designed for visual comparisons, transformations, and creative effects, supporting both standard and depth map-based transitions.

custom_nodes.author: hmwl
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TaskMonitor
custom_nodes.description: A powerful task monitoring extension for ComfyUI that provides real-time progress tracking, workflow statistics, and execution monitoring.

custom_nodes.author: karthikg-09
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Vton-Mask
custom_nodes.description: A lightweight ComfyUI custom node for generating high-quality masks and pose detection for virtual try-on applications. This node extracts only the essential masking functionality from FitDiT without requiring heavy diffusion models.

custom_nodes.author: KAVVATARE
custom_nodes.title: RightEyeDisparity
custom_nodes.description: A simple ComfyUI node for generating right eye disparity for VR videos

custom_nodes.author: jaimitoes
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Wan2_1_lora_trainer
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI interface adaptation of the musubi-tunner library to train Wan 2.1 loras.

custom_nodes.author: angree
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Q_GLB_Material_Modifier
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node for enhancing GLB 3D models generated with Hunyuan 3D 2.0. This module helps solve the common 'plastic look' problem by adding realistic materials and smart emissive elements.

custom_nodes.author: R5-Revo
custom_nodes.title: Universal LLM Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: UniversalLLMNode is a custom node for ComfyUI that provides a unified interface to use multiple major LLM APIs, including OpenAI, Anthropic (Claude), Google Gemini, Groq, and Mistral. It is ideal for tasks such as automatically generating high-quality SDXL prompts for image generation.

custom_nodes.author: ComfyAssets
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Prompt Manager
custom_nodes.description: A powerful ComfyUI custom node that extends the standard text encoder with persistent prompt storage, advanced search capabilities, and an automatic image gallery system using SQLite.

custom_nodes.author: silveroxides
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_EmbeddingToolkit
custom_nodes.description: Toolkit for creating embeddings for various models in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: LevelPixel
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_LevelPixel_Advanced
custom_nodes.description: Advanced nodes of the Level Pixel company. Includes convenient advanced nodes for working with LLM и VLM models (LLaVa) with GGUF format. Qwen2.5-VL and Qwen2.5 supported. Also included is a node for the RAM model. Nodes have the ability to automatically unload models from VRAM.

custom_nodes.author: SanDiegoDude
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DeepStereo
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for DeepStereo, an auto-autostereogram generator

custom_nodes.author: ptmaster
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-audio-speed
custom_nodes.description: This node pack is designed to adjust audio playback speed within ComfyUI, particularly to sync audio with models like FantasyTalking (WAN) that require specific frame rates. It can also be used for general-purpose audio speed control.

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Gemini_TTS
custom_nodes.description: A powerful ComfyUI custom node that brings Google's Gemini TTS capabilities directly to your workflow. Generate high-quality speech with 30+ voices supporting both free and paid tiers.

custom_nodes.author: 1038lab
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-JoyCaption
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node powered by LLaVA VLM for advanced image captioning with customizable styles and memory-efficient inference.

custom_nodes.author: thezveroboy
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LUT
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for ComfyUI for simple LUT file extraction from any image.

custom_nodes.author: TFL-TFL
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Text_Translation
custom_nodes.description: Text translation node for ComfyUI: No need to apply for a translation API key, just use it. Currently supports more than thirty translation platforms.

custom_nodes.author: shinich39
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-break-workflow
custom_nodes.description: Break the execution, save the incompleted image then continue later.

custom_nodes.author: Charonartist
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-EagleExporter
custom_nodes.description: This is an extension that automatically saves video files generated with ComfyUI's 'video combine' extension to the Eagle library.

custom_nodes.author: Charonartist
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui_gemini_tts_node
custom_nodes.description: This custom node is a ComfyUI node for generating speech from text using the Gemini 2.5 Flash Preview TTS API.

custom_nodes.author: babe-and-spencer-enterprises
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Upload to BASE Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node that lets you upload generated images directly to your [a/BASE](https://getbase.app/) account — no manual downloads or re-uploads needed.

custom_nodes.author: wildminder
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-KEEP
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-KEEP: Kalman-Inspired Feature Propagation for Video Face Super-Resolution in ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: mw
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui_HeyGem
custom_nodes.description: HeyGem AI avatar.

custom_nodes.author: Limbicnation
custom_nodes.title: Transparency Background Remover
custom_nodes.description: Automatic background removal and transparency generation for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: kevin314
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-FastVideo
custom_nodes.description: A custom node suite for ComfyUI that provides accelerated video generation using [a/FastVideo](https://github.com/hao-ai-labs/FastVideo). See the [a/blog post](https://hao-ai-lab.github.io/blogs/fastvideo/) about FastVideo V1 to learn more.

custom_nodes.author: AEmotionStudio
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ShaderNoiseKSampler
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-ShaderNoiseKSampler is an advanced custom KSampler node that replaces standard noise generation with a multi-stage shader-based system. Unlike traditional sampling that teleports randomly between different seeds, this tool provides a structured vehicle for exploring the neighborhood around a chosen seed, using mathematical patterns to navigate along coherent paths through latent space.

custom_nodes.author: cloudkoala
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-koala
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI focused on aspect ratio management and other utilities.

custom_nodes.author: lepiai
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Minitools
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Mini Toolkit – Helps reduce node redundancy. Let’s see if there’s time to keep it updated regularly.

custom_nodes.author: Yuan-ManX
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AniSora
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-AniSora is now available in ComfyUI, Index-AniSora is the most powerful open-source animated video generation model. It enables one-click creation of video shots across diverse anime styles including series episodes, Chinese original animations, manga adaptations, VTuber content, anime PVs, mad-style parodies(鬼畜动画), and more!

custom_nodes.author: smthemex
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_VisualCloze
custom_nodes.description: VisualCloze: A Universal Image Generation Framework via Visual In-Context Learning,you can use it in ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: lrzjason
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Watermark Detection Node
custom_nodes.description: This custom node for ComfyUI provides watermark detection capabilities using a YOLO model trained by [a/fancyfeast](https://huggingface.co/fancyfeast), the creator of JoyCaption. The model is originally hosted at [a/Hugging Face Space](https://huggingface.co/spaces/fancyfeast/joycaption-watermark-detection).

custom_nodes.author: craig-tanaka
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Anime Segmentation Nodes v1.1.0
custom_nodes.description: This is a set of custom nodes for ComfyUI that provide anime-style image segmentation using efficient pre-trained models.

custom_nodes.author: lum3on
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Model Quantizer
custom_nodes.description: This is a node to converts models into Fp8, bf16, fp16.

custom_nodes.author: Yuan-ManX
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MoviiGen
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-MoviiGen is now available in ComfyUI, MoviiGen 1.1 is a cutting-edge video generation model that excels in cinematic aesthetics and visual quality.

custom_nodes.author: Jannled
custom_nodes.title: OWL-ViT ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Nodes for OWL-ViT / OWLv2 using the HuggingFace Transformers implementation

custom_nodes.author: 1038lab
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LBM
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI implementation of Latent Bridge Matching (LBM) for efficient image relighting. This node utilizes the LBM algorithm to perform single-step image-to-image translation specifically for relighting tasks.

custom_nodes.author: thedivergentai
custom_nodes.title: Divergent Nodes
custom_nodes.description: This repository contains a collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI designed to integrate external AI models, provide utilities, and enable advanced workflows.

custom_nodes.author: mw
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_parakeet-tdt
custom_nodes.description: parakeet-tdt-0.6b-v2: Automatic speech recognition (ASR) model designed for high-quality English transcription, featuring support for punctuation, capitalization, and accurate timestamp prediction.

custom_nodes.author: jqy-yo
custom_nodes.title: BBoxLowerMask2
custom_nodes.description: Create a mask to slice the image at specific coordinates

custom_nodes.author: ICAI Icelandic Center for Artificial Intelligence
custom_nodes.title: Sampler Scheduler Metrics Tester for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This custom node for ComfyUI allows you to test combinations of samplers and schedulers. It generates a batch of generated images(latents), as well as RGB images, each one annotated with the specific combination used, performance timing, and several image quality metrics (Laplacian Variance, Gradient Mean, FFT-based sharpness) for our internal usage, but kept as they could may be useful for others to.

custom_nodes.author: 2frames.app
custom_nodes.title: AQnodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Nodes for ComfyUI, mostly for llm calling and automatizing pulid multiface.

custom_nodes.author: BigWhiteFly
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ImageConcat
custom_nodes.description: concatenate all images in floders, concatenate caption txt files for trainning loras.

custom_nodes.author: skycoder
custom_nodes.title: Filename Tools
custom_nodes.description: A utility node for extracting and trimming filenames from file paths

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-FramePackWrapper_Plus
custom_nodes.description: An extension that's adds advanced audio processing capabilities to ComfyUI with professional-grade audio effects and AI-powered audio enhancement.

custom_nodes.author: cluny85
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Scripting-Tools
custom_nodes.description: A set of utility nodes for ComfyUI focused on scripting. Includes an enhanced UUID generator node.

custom_nodes.author: cluny85
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-downloader
custom_nodes.description: Custom ComfyUI Nodes for verifing needed files/models are present per workflow, can download if missing.

custom_nodes.author: LamEmil
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI ASCII Art Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI that enable the creation of various ASCII art effects, from static images to complex, colorized typing animations and video conversions.

custom_nodes.author: judian17
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI JoyCaption-Beta-GGUF Node
custom_nodes.description: This project provides a node for ComfyUI to use the JoyCaption-Beta model in GGUF format for image captioning.

custom_nodes.author: Kyron Mahan
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Smart Scaler
custom_nodes.description: A package for intelligent image scaling, aspect ratio adjustments, metadata extraction, and video frame processing for Wan 2.1 vid2vid/img2vid workflows with Pony/SDXL models.

custom_nodes.author: purewater2011
custom_nodes.title: comfyui_color_detection
custom_nodes.description: This plugin adds functionality to ComfyUI for detecting yellow tones in images, making it particularly useful for skin tone analysis and image color evaluation.

custom_nodes.author: AIExplorer25
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_ImageCaptioner
custom_nodes.description: This custom node helps to generate cation for images for lora training.

custom_nodes.author: X-School-Academy
custom_nodes.title: X-FluxAgent
custom_nodes.description: X-FluxAgent turns ComfyUI into a smart, AI-powered agent capable of building software, automating tasks, and even managing your daily workflows — all with natural language prompts, no coding experience needed.

custom_nodes.author: gordon123
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_DreamBoard
custom_nodes.description: a simple prompter for video

custom_nodes.author: San4itos
custom_nodes.title: Save Images to Video (FFmpeg) for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI to save image sequences as video files using FFmpeg. Supports various codecs, audio muxing, and in-node previews.

custom_nodes.author: Yuan-ManX
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Step1X-3D
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-Step1X-3D is now available in ComfyUI, delivering high-fidelity 3D asset generation with consistent geometry-texture alignment. It supports multi-style outputs: cartoon, sketch, and photorealistic.

custom_nodes.author: AEmotionStudio
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MagnifyGlass
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-MagnifyGlass: A powerful & customizable magnifying glass for ComfyUI. Zoom into canvas details with smooth controls, configurable activation, custom styles (shape, size, border) & WebGL performance.

custom_nodes.author: ratatule2
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LBMWrapper
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-LBMWrapper is a user-friendly interface designed to simplify the integration of lightweight models into your projects. It streamlines workflows by providing essential tools for managing and deploying models with ease.

custom_nodes.author: godmt
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-IP-Composer
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI wrapper of IP-Composer

custom_nodes.author: Sayene
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-base64-to-image-size
custom_nodes.description: Loads an image and its transparency mask from a base64-encoded data URI. This is useful for API connections as you can transfer data directly rather than specify a file location.

custom_nodes.author: magic-eraser-org
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Unwatermark
custom_nodes.description:
ComfyUI-Unwatermark: A ComfyUI custom node to intelligently remove watermarks from images using the unwatermark.ai API.
This custom node for ComfyUI allows you to easily remove watermarks from your images by leveraging the power of the unwatermark.ai API.

custom_nodes.author: mw
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_ACE-Step
custom_nodes.description: ACE-Step: A Step Towards Music Generation Foundation Model

custom_nodes.author: xuhongming251
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Jimeng
custom_nodes.description: for use jimeng ai in comfyui

custom_nodes.author: TrophiHunter
custom_nodes.title: Photography Nodes
custom_nodes.description: I wanted a way to batch add effects to images inside Comfyui so I made these nodes. Some of the effects should be ordered specifically so they stack and are effecting the image emulating camera effectsI made some workflows to show you the correct order.

custom_nodes.author: KERRY-YUAN
custom_nodes.title: NodeSparkTTS
custom_nodes.description: This node package contains nodes for Spark-TTS controllable synthesis and voice cloning..

custom_nodes.author: Yuan-ManX
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Matrix-Game
custom_nodes.description: Make Matrix-Game avialbe in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: Dontdrunk
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DD-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Provide powerful frontend and backend integration node packages for ComfyUI - this is an exceptionally robust integration extension.
